name: Rubiks
description:
Included in downloads is runnable jar file and source code. #LD32

You are feliks, i rubiks cube master. Everything you hold dear to you is about to be destroyed as an evil being, only known as RM, has set out to destroy every rubiks cube ever made.

Note**: this game is not finished and has no collision if you fall off a platform and so will automatically freeze if that happens. And there is no way to win yet, this is only getting uploaded fro the compo as i will not be able to work on it anymore for a couple of days.
